text: Futhi uMose wathi, “Nkosi yethu ngempela wena wanika uFaro nabaholi bakhe ubuhle obukhulu nengcebo empilweni yalomhlaba Nkosi yethu ukuze badukise (abantu) endleleni yakho, Nkosi bhubhisa ingcebo yabo futhi wenze izinhliziyo zabo lukhuni ukuze bangakholwa kuze kube babona isijeziso esibuhlungu”
